intro.title: Finding My Heart's Direction
description: Instead of being swept away by waves, find the direction your ocean truly wants to flow.
Values are not a shore to reach, but a lighthouse that guides the flow of your entire sea.
Check if your current is flowing toward that light, and create a small ripple toward the center.
intro.contentDescription: Discover what truly matters to you and plan small, intentional steps that align with that direction.
steps: 1. Mark your current position on the 4-domain target.
2. Define the 'Value' for the area furthest from the center.
3. Identify the obstacles standing in your way.
4. Decide on a small 'committed action' to take, even with those obstacles.
intro.tip: Tip: A value is not a 'goal' to achieve, but a constant direction of 'who you want to be' as an ocean.

step1.title: How close are your current actions to your values?
step1.description: Please tap all 4 areas to mark your spot. The closer you are to the center (Bull's Eye), the more you are living in line with your values.

step2.title: Who do you want to be in this area?
step2.description: These are the areas furthest from the center. If there were no obstacles, what kind of person (value) would you want to be here?
step2.placeholder: e.g., Someone who knows how to pause and reflect for growth.

step3.title: What obstacles are holding you back?
step3.description: Write down the thoughts, feelings, or situations that stop you from living a value-driven life.
step3.placeholder: e.g., Anxiety about falling behind, the pressure to be perfect.

step4.title: A small ripple to move 1cm closer
step4.description: Choose a very small, specific action you can take for your values, even when obstacles appear.
step4.placeholder: e.g., Gently reflecting on my day for 5 minutes.

result.title: Finding My Values and Direction
description: A lighthouse is now shining over your deepened ocean.
Even if rough waves shake you, your current can now flow steadily toward that light.
The small ripples you created today will eventually complete the vast ocean you dream of.
